messages.body: $TSLA @BARCLAYS reaffirmed a sell rating today https://www.smarteranalyst.com/brief/barclays-reaffirms-their-sell-rating-on-tesla-tsla/

links.title: Barclays Reaffirms Their Sell Rating on Tesla (TSLA)
links.description: In a report released today, Brian Johnson from Barclays maintained a Sell rating on Tesla (NASDAQ: TSLA), with a price target of $210. The company's shares opened today at $319.27. According to TipRanks.com, Johnson is a 4-star analyst with an average return of 5.2% and a 52.6% success rate.

links.title: Elon Musk is skipping Burning Man this year
links.description: Elon Musk, who has had a tough year, is not expected this week at Burning Man, the temporary city in the Nevada desert dedicated to art, music, sex and drugs. The Tesla creator went every year for nine years, but this year the SEC is reportedly investigating Tesla after Musk's recent tweet about taking the company private, which led to wild swings in the price of its stock.

links.title: Major Tesla Shareholders Trimmed Holdings in Q2: 13F
links.description: Tesla Inc. ( TSLA), the electric car manufacturer headed up by billionaire innovator Elon Musk, has garnered lots of attention in recent weeks. Musk announced plans earlier this summer to take the company private, and in the intervening time there has been substantial debate about this proposal.
